original_name: Qixuan wang yu Zhong Wu Yan
plot: This is a humorous mythical period drama based on the famous Chinese legend of Zhong Wu Yan and Qixuan the King. A special lady, Zhong Wu Yan rose from the ordinary, empowered herself, ...
